name: FOUR (Hexfall)
description:
WELCOME TO FOUR!

Each player gets a random set of letters and must create a four lettered word.
Each time you get a word right a ball in your bucket will pop and the first player to empty their bucket wins!

If you complete four words in a row without messing up you will spawn two balls into your opponents bucket. This is indicated by the four red boxes turning green.

Player 1: WASD

Player 2: IJKL

Letters can be repeated in words.

Press space at any time to restart.
